# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = Vector{String}()
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(text)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= " " * word
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)  # Add any remaining words
    return join(lines, "\n")     # Join the lines with newline characters
end

text = "Hello there this is a very long string that should be wrapped into multiple lines."
println(wrap_string(text))  # Output: Hello there this is a very long string that should be wrapped into multiple lines.
```
